Home > Restaurants > Silver Summit Cafe

Silver Summit Cafe

American Diner/Mexican $ Silver Creek

Local's secret spot located in 7-Eleven gas station with surprisingly good food. Most reasonable prices in Park City. Outdoor patio overlooking golf course. Don't be put off by location.

Must-Try Dishes

  • Silver Summit Omelette (sausage, bacon, cheese)
  • Pancakes
  • Big Burrito with choice of meat
  • Mexican plates with authentic flavor

Features & Amenities

Gas Station Location Most Reasonable Prices Outdoor Patio Golf Course Views Locals Secret Cash Tips Preferred

Perfect For

Breakfast Budget Dining Local Experience

Restaurant Information

Hours

Daily breakfast and lunch (hours vary)

Contact

6065 Silver Creek Dr, Park City, UT 84098

Visit Website
